DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of SB1578 in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Single and Multiple-Dose Study of SB1578
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult males and/or females of nonchildbearing potential, 18 to 55 years of age (inclusive). Body mass index (BMI) ≥ 18.5 and ≤ 29.9 (kg/m2) and weight between 55 and 100 kg (inclusive). Medically healthy with clinically insignificant screening results. History or presence of significant disease.
